text: I’m trying to register a package but there are missing compat entries in Project.toml. Shouldn’t those (or at least some kind of template for them) be created when I `Pkg.add` the dependencies in the package’s environment?

elements.text: I’m trying to register a package but there are missing compat entries in Project.toml. Shouldn’t those (or at least some kind of template for them) be created when I
the dependencies in the package’s environment?

text: Or is there a way to just say “fill the compat entries with the current versions of the packages that are installed, since I know they are working”?

elements.text: Or is there a way to just say “fill the compat entries with the current versions of the packages that are installed, since I know they are working”?
